text: And whatever you do, do it in the name of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks to God the Father through him.
I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me.
The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want.
Jesus answered, 'It is written: 'Man shall not live on bread alone, but on everyword that comes from the mouth of God.' '
Therefore confess your sins to each other and pray for each other so that you may be healed. The prayer of a righteous man is powerful and effective.
The Lord will fight for you; you need only to be still.
Because he himself suffered when he was tempted, he is able to help those who are being tempted.
Two are better than one because they have a good return for their labor:...
